infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: CCT Driver uses your location to track your position during active medical transportation trips. This allows dispatchers to monitor trip progress, calculate accurate ETAs for patients and facilities, and ensure safe and timely pickups and drop-offs. Location tracking only occurs during your active work shifts.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: CCT Driver uses your location while the app is open to display your current position on the map, calculate routes to pickup and drop-off locations, and provide turn-by-turn navigation to patient destinations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: CCT Driver uses background location to continue tracking your trip progress even when the app is minimized. This ensures dispatchers can monitor active trips and patients receive accurate arrival time updates.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: CCT Driver requires photo library access to save and upload your handwritten signature for daily vehicle inspection forms. This digital signature serves as your official attestation that the pre-trip safety inspection was completed as required by DOT regulations.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: CCT Driver uses your camera to capture your handwritten signature for vehicle inspection forms. This signature is required to certify that you have completed the mandatory pre-trip vehicle safety inspection.
